definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: gift (? on form, then comp. [[חאחא]] Ges:§84 b viii; but mng. (and √) dub.; poss. fr. NH [[הִבְהֵב]] roast, Levy:NHWB i. 447 b)—only pl. sf.: [[זִבְחֵי הַבְהָבַי יִזְבְּהוּ]] Ho 8:13 as the sacrifices of my gifts (= my sacrificial gifts, so Che) they sacrifice flesh.
